1.11.1.7.1-pre9: added network message to sync config when player joins server
1.11.1.7.1-pre8: fixed dupe glitch, fixed shift click into wrong slot
1.11.1.7.1-pre5: fixed bug with multiplier not being correctly applied to stacked items
1.11.1.7.1-pre4: fixed duplication glitch if player doesn't have enough XP
1.11.1.7.1-pre2: fixed ItemStack bug with nugget lookup in Ore Dictionary
1.11.1.7.1-pre1: new version with lots of new features!
